constituent: hundred million, person, idea, sound, vase, stand up, sun, day, heart
koohiiStory1: Mr. T has an clear idea of what he would do if he ever got hundred million dollar. (I guess it would be a enormous gold chain !).
koohiiStory2: Mr. T´s bright idea is to get a hundred million kids to vow not to use drugs. "C´mon, foo! Sign the paper!".
